mapper.insert: insert into cs_install_statistics (N_ID, CHANNEL, PRODUCT_NAME, PHONE_SERIAL_NUM, DATA_SOURCE, RECORD_NUM, IMPORTER, STR0, STR1, COMP_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODI_BY, MODI_TIME, ORG_ID, SORT_NUM, `STATUS`, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_ID) values (#{nId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneSerialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recordNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{importer,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{str0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{str1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modiBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modiTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{product,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select N_ID, CHANNEL, PRODUCT_NAME, PHONE_SERIAL_NUM, DATA_SOURCE, RECORD_NUM, IMPORTER, STR0, STR1, COMP_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODI_BY, MODI_TIME, ORG_ID, SORT_NUM, `STATUS`, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_ID from cs_install_statistics
